---
title: "About"
---

On this website, you will find information about the types of squirrels, locations, and behaviors of squirrels in Central Park in New York City. 

The data that are used are the 2018 Central Park Squirrel Data from NYC Open Data. 

This project is created by Columbia University students Dania Jafar, Kristal Quispe, Alexis Colangelo, Si Li, and Barik Rajpal.
